description: Chocolate chip cookie humorously breaks up with marshmallow for being 's'more-ish'.
title: Sweet Breakup
n_1: Cookie and Marshmallow sit on a plate, surrounded by Valentine's decorations.
n_2: Marshmallow looks confused as Cookie sighs, gazing at the stars.
n_3: Cookie decides it's time for a change, wanting less s'more-ishness.
n_4: They part ways amicably, leaving the plate for separate adventures.
c2_4: Guess I'm too s'more-ish for you!
